nodes.text: A regent was the title held by a temporary ruler serving in the absence of a monarch, notably in the case of Ord Cestus, and Kallos Sook of the Naboo princely city state of Kaadara. Zelor held the title of Lord Regent during his rule of the planet Velmor.

In the case of the One Sith, various Chagrian Sith Lords, each bearing in turn the name of Darth Wyyrlok, bore the title while the One Sith's leader, Dark Lord of the Sith Darth Krayt, went into stasis. The Regent was considered the "voice" of the Dark Lord and commanded in his stead. By 137 ABY, a third Wyyrlok assumed control of the One Sith as regent after killing the Dark Lord on Had Abbadon.

Regent was also the title given to Grand Admiral Morlish Veed when he agreed to act as a figurehead for Darth Wyyrlok and the public face of the reborn Galactic Empire. After the death of Darth Wyyrlok at the hands of his former Master, Darth Krayt reclaimed control of both the One Sith and the Empire. His first act was to relieve Veed from his position as Regent.
